item.description:
Please join us for our first in a series of "Thirsty Thursdays".

We'll be meeting this week at Billy Goodes, to watch the comedic performances of local AND non-local comedians. We hear some of them might even be funny. If not, don't worry... There will be copious amounts of beer, so you won't know the difference. At only five dollars, what do you have to lose (besides the five dollars, of course)? - Adam

Adam is actually hosting the Thursday meetups, so look for him, not me. If you don't show up his ego will be bruised forever and he'll need therapy, which I don't provide for free. So in support of his mental health, I think you should attend. Paula
item.how_to_find_us: Can't find Adam? Try my cell: (401) 699-7304.
item.name: Thirsty Thursdays: Comedy Night
